title: Elementary Analysis: The Theory of Calculus
author: Kenneth A. Ross
body: Mathematics text that provides a rigorous treatment of real analysis. Improper integrals are covered, and even Dedikind cuts are mentioned.

title: Ender's Game
author: Orson Scott Card
body: Ender was a young boy when he was recruited into a military organization. Ender is a mis-pronounced version of 'Andrew'. Ender saves the world.

title: The Left Hand of Darkness
author: Ursula K. Le Guin
body: This novel won both Hugo and Nebula awards in the same year.
